name: Arcane Laboratory
description: A magical workshop contains dangerous experiments, powerful artifacts, and forbidden research that could change the world. The valuable magical knowledge and items attract ambitious spellcasters, while the unstable experiments and magical defenses create constant danger.
atmosphere: Strange magical apparatus hums and crackles with dangerous energy. Air crackles with spell components, alchemical fumes, and forbidden knowledge scent. Strange bubbling sounds and magical discharges echo through chambers. Skin tingles with presence of unstable magical experiments. Taste of power and danger fills mouth. Weight of dangerous experiments and powerful artifacts makes heart race with excitement and fear.
